src_original: aham amukanāmnā vaī ācāryasamakṣaṃ sthitaḥ //  praviśāmi mahāguhyaṃ buddhanāṭakasaṃbhavam //  avaivartikacakrādyaṃ mahāmokṣapuraṃ varaṃ //  praveśa māṃ mahācārya sarvaguhyakuloccayam //  dadasva me mahābhāgaṃ avaivartyabhiṣecanaṃ //  dadasva me mahācārya lakṣaṇasyānumodanaṃ //
anuvyañjanasaṃyuktaṃ buddhakāyaṃ manoramam //  dadasva me mahācārya abhiṣekaṃ mahādbhutam //  ācāryo 'haṃ bhaven nityaṃ sarvasattvārthakāraṇāt //  tata ācāryeṇa sarvakulavijñaptiḥ kāryā /
buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ ca triratnaśaraṇaṃ vraja //
etad buddhakule ramye saṃvaraṃ bhavate dṛḍham //
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca tvayā grāhyā mahāmate //
yad bodhicittaṃ tad vajraṃ prajñā ghaṇṭā iti smṛtā //
